menu.name: Chicken Pomegranate Salad
menu.description: A simple, sweet and delicious salad of chicken, pomegranates, spinach, and spiced candied walnuts. Served with a side of citrus vinaigrette.

menu.name: Strawberry Pudding
menu.description: A sweet and tasty pudding filled with strawyberries, blueberries, and raspberries.

menu.name: Ham and Goat Cheese Croissant
menu.description: A savory slice of ham topped with a wedge of goat cheese, all on a buttery, flaky croissant.
